verses.arabic: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ
verses.english: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an...
verses.hausa: ¡̃. Inã rantsuwa da Alƙur'ãni Mai girma.

verses.arabic: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.english: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, sun yi mãmãki, cewa mai gargaɗi, daga gare su, yã zo musu, sai kãfirai suka ce: "Wannan wani abu ne mai ban mãmãki."

verses.arabic: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌ
verses.english: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return."
verses.hausa: "Shin idan muka mutu kuma muka kasance turɓãya (zã a kõmo da mu)? Waccan kõmowa ce mai nĩsa."

verses.arabic: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ
verses.english: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Mun san abin da ƙasã ke ragẽwo daga gare su, kuma wurinMu akwai wani littãfi mai tsarẽwa.

verses.arabic: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.english: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, sun ƙaryata ne game da gaskiyar a lõkacin da ta je musu, sabõda haka sunã a cikin wani al'amari mai raurawa.

verses.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
verses.english: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?
verses.hausa: Shin, to, ba su yi dubi ba zuwa ga samã a bisa gare su, yadda Muka gĩna ta, kuma Muka ƙawãce ta, kuma bã ta da waɗansu tsãgogi?

verses.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ
verses.english: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,
verses.hausa: Da ƙasã, Mun mĩƙe ta, kuma Mun jẽfa kafaffun duwãtsu a cikinta, kuma Mun tsirar, a cikinta daga kõwane ma'auri mai ban sha'awa?

verses.arabic: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.english: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah].
verses.hausa: Dõmin wãyar da ido da tunãtarwa ga dukan bãwa mai tawakkali?

verses.arabic: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً مُّبَـٰرَكًا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٍ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ
verses.english: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest
verses.hausa: Kuma Mun sassakar, daga samã ruwa mai albarka sa'an nan Muka tsirar game da shi (itãcen) lambuna da ƙwãya abin girbẽwa.

verses.arabic: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَـٰتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
verses.english: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -
verses.hausa: Da itãcen dabĩno dõgãye, sunã da'ya'yan itãce gunda mãsu hauhawar jũna.

verses.arabic: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ
verses.english: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection.
verses.hausa: Dõmin arziki ga bãyi, kuma Muka rãyar da ƙasa matacciya game da shi. Kamar wannan ne fitar daga kabari kake.

verses.arabic: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.english: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud
verses.hausa: Mutãnen Nũhu sun ƙaryata, a gabãninsu (mutãnen yanzu) da ma'abũta Rassi, da Samũdãwa.

verses.arabic: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍ
verses.english: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot
verses.hausa: Da Ãdãwa da Fir'auna da 'yan'uwan Lũɗu.

verses.arabic: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.english: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.
verses.hausa: Da ma'abũta ƙunci da mutãnen Tubba'u, kõwanensu ya ƙaryata Manzanni, sai ƙyacẽwaTa ta tabbata.

verses.arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.english: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.
verses.hausa: Shin, to, Mun kãsa ne game da halittar farko? Ã'a, su sunã a cikin rikici daga halitta sãbuwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
verses.english: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Mun halitta mutum kuma Mun san abin da ransa ke yin waswãsi da shi, kuma Mũ ne mafi kusanta zuwa gare shi daga lakar jannayẽnsa.

verses.arabic: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.english: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left.
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da mãsu haɗuwa biyu suke haɗuwa daga dãma, kuma daga hagu akwai wani (malã'ika) zaunanne.

verses.arabic: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.english: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].
verses.hausa: Bã ya lafazi da wata magana fãce a lĩƙe da shi akwai mai tsaro halartacce.

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.english: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.
verses.hausa: Kuma mãyen mutuwa ya jẽ da gaskiya. Wannan shĩ ne abin da ka kasance daga gare shi kanã bijirẽwa.

verses.arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.english: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.
verses.hausa: Kuma aka hũra a cikin ƙaho. Wancan yinin ƙyacẽwar ne fa.

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.english: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.
verses.hausa: Kuma kõwane rai ya zo, tãre da shi akwai mai kõra da mai shaida.

verses.arabic: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.english: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp."
verses.hausa: (Sai a ce masa): "Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, ka kasance a cikin gafala daga wannan. To, Mun kuranye maka rufinka, sabõda haka ganinka a yau, mai kaifi ne."

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.english: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."
verses.hausa: Kuma abõkin haɗinsa ya ce: "Wannan shi ne abin da ke tãre da ni halarce."

verses.arabic: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.english: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,
verses.hausa: (A ce wa Malã'iku), "Ku jẽfa, a cikin Jahannama, dukan mai yawan kãfirci, mai tsaurin rai."

verses.arabic: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.english: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,
verses.hausa: "Mai yawan hanãwa ga alhẽri, mai zãlunci, mai shakka."

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ
verses.english: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."
verses.hausa: "Wanda ya sanya, tãre da Allah wani abin bautãwa na dabam, sabõda haka kujẽfa shi a cikin azãba mai tsanani."

verses.arabic: قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
verses.english: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."
verses.hausa: Abõkin haɗinsa ya ce: "Ya Ubangijinmu! Ban sanya shi girman kai ba, kuma amma ya kasance a cikin ɓata mai nĩsa."

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ
verses.english: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Kada ku yi husũma a wuriNa, alhãli Na gabãtar da ƙyacewa zuwa gare ku."

verses.arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.english: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."
verses.hausa: "Ba a musanya magana a wuriNa, Kuma Ban zama Mai zãlunci ba ga bãyiNa."

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
verses.english: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"
verses.hausa: Rãnar da Muke cẽwa ga Jahannama "Shin, kin cika?" Kuma ta ce: "Ashe, akwai wani ƙãri?"

verses.arabic: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.english: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,
verses.hausa: Kuma a kusantar dã Aljanna ga mãsu taƙawa, ba da nĩsa ba.

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.english: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]
verses.hausa: "Wannan shĩ ne abin da ake yi muku wa'adi da shi ga dukan mai yawan kõmawa ga Allah, mai tsarewar (umurninSa).

verses.arabic: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.english: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].
verses.hausa: "Wanda ya ji tsõron Mai rahama a fake, kuma ya zo da wata irin zũciya mai tawakkali."

verses.arabic: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ
verses.english: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."
verses.hausa: (A ce musu) "Ku shige ta da aminci, waccan ita ce rãnar dawwama."

verses.arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.english: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.
verses.hausa: Sunã da abin da suke so a cikinta, kuma tãre da Mũ akwai ƙãrin ni'ima,

verses.arabic: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَـٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.english: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?
verses.hausa: Kuma da yawa Muka halakar, a gabãninsu, (mutãnen yanzu) ɗaga waɗansu al'ummomi, (waɗanda suke) sũ ne mafi ƙarfin damƙa daga gare su, sa'an nan suka yi bincike a cikin ƙasãshe: 'Kõ akwai wurin tsĩra'? (Babu).

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.english: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, a cikin wancan, akwai tunãtarwa ga wanda zũciyarsa ta kasance gare shi, kõ kuwa ya jẽfa saurãro, alhãli kuwa yanã halarce (da hankalinsa).

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
verses.english: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun halitta sammai da ƙasã da abin da ke a tsakãninsu, a cikin kwãnaki shida, alhãli wata'yar wahala ba ta shãfe Mu ba.

verses.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ
verses.english: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, ka yi haƙuri a kan abin da suke fadã, kuma ka yi tasĩhi game da gõdẽ wa Ubangijinka (watau ka yi salla) a gabãnin fitõwar rãnã da gabãnin ɓacẽwarta.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
verses.english: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration.
verses.hausa: Kuma daga dare, sai ka yi tasbĩhi a gare Shi da bãyan sujada.

verses.arabic: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.english: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -
verses.hausa: Kuma ka saurãra a rãnar da mai kira ke yin kira daga wuri makusanci.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ
verses.english: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].
verses.hausa: Rãnar da suke saurãron tsãwa da gaskiya. Wancan shĩ ne yinin fita (daga kabari).

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ
verses.english: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ ne haƙĩƙa, Mu ne ke rãyarwa, kuma Mũ ne ke kashẽwa, kuma zuwa gare Mu kawai ne makõmar take.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.english: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.
verses.hausa: Rãnar da ƙasã ke tsattsãgẽwa daga gare su, sunã mãsu gaggãwa. Wancan tãrãwar mutãne ne, mai sauƙi a gare Mu.

verses.arabic: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.english: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat.
verses.hausa: Mũ ne mafi sani game da abin da suke faɗi, kuma bã zã ka zama mai tĩlasta su ba. Sabõda haka ka tunatar game da Alƙur'ani, ga wanda ke tsõron ƙyacewaTa.
